wikipedia_page.main: Group captain Richard Charles Marler Collard  (25 August 1911 – 9 August 1962) was a British Royal Air Force officer and politician. His sudden death at the age of 50 occurred less than three years after he was first elected to the House of Commons.

Index of World War II articles (R)

response: The Central Norfolk by-election of 1962 was held on 22 November 1962 after the death of the incumbent Conservative MP, Richard Collard.  It was retained by the Conservative candidate Ian Gilmour.
